mapper.select: select distinct m.email, m.name, m.code, m.phone, f.reward_name from member m inner join purchase p on m.code = p.member_code inner join funding f on f.code = p.funding_code where m.email_accept=1 and p.purchase_state=603 and f.funding_state='503'

select distinct m.email, m.name, m.code, m.phone, f.reward_name from member m inner join purchase p on m.code = p.member_code inner join funding f on f.code = p.funding_code where m.email_accept=1 and p.purchase_state=603 and f.funding_state='504'
select id, name, email from member where email_accept=1

select distinct m.email,m.name, m.code, m.phone, f.reward_name from funding f inner join purchase p on f.code = p.funding_code inner join member m on p.member_code = m.code where to_date(end_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') = 1 and m.email_accept=1 and p.purchase_state=603 and funding_state='501'

select distinct m.email,m.name, m.code, m.phone, f.reward_name from funding f inner join likes l on f.code = l.funding_code inner join member m on l.member_code = m.code where to_date(end_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') - to_date(to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy/mm/dd'), 'yyyy/mm/dd') = 1 and m.email_accept=1 and funding_state='501'
